rooms.title: Dustlit Library
rooms.description: Shelves lean with the weight of forgotten ideas. A faint smell of paper and ozone. Passages branch to specialized wings and an old stairwell spirals upward.

items.name: Whispering Quill
items.description: It trembles with unscribed ideas, eager to note your discoveries.

items.name: Star Chart
items.description: Constellations rearrange themselves to trace paths through the stacks.

rooms.title: Scriptorium of Murmured Ink
rooms.description: Tall lecterns cradle scrolls that write themselves, quills whispering secrets of visitors past.

rooms.title: Illumination Studio
rooms.description: Gold leaf dust floats in sunshafts while automatons patiently gild every margin in sight.

rooms.title: Vault of Glyphs
rooms.description: Shelves of rune-carved stones hum softly, rearranging into new phrases when no one watches.

rooms.title: Garden of Living Ink
rooms.description: Vines bloom with characters that drip like dew, spelling compliments to anyone who lingers.

rooms.title: Astral Gallery
rooms.description: Paintings of distant nebulae pulse in real time, sharing borrowed starlight with the hall.

rooms.title: Clockwork Planetarium
rooms.description: Brass constellations spin overhead, projecting constellations that occasionally wink back.

rooms.title: Chapel of Echoed Memory
rooms.description: Benches face empty air where voices gather, replaying gratitude offered by travelers long gone.

rooms.title: Echo Archive
rooms.description: Rows of crystal cylinders capture laughter, arguments, and lullabies awaiting a new audience.

rooms.title: Windworn Observatory
rooms.description: An aged telescope peers through a ragged aperture; faint comets leave notes in its ledger.

rooms.title: Celestial Walkway
rooms.description: A glass-floored bridge floats through a pocket of gravity, stars drifting lazily beneath your boots.

rooms.title: Skybridge of Lanterns
rooms.description: Wind-bells stitched from constellations chime, guiding wanderers toward higher, brighter places.

rooms.title: Cloud Dock
rooms.description: Tethers secure zephyrs like ships, each labeled with a destination written in vapor.

rooms.title: Balloon Roost
rooms.description: Deflated exploration balloons roost like sleeping birds, dreaming of tomorrow's discoveries.
